languages.text: "Для вас, {mf|господин|госпожа}, всегда найдется". {n}На стойке появляется пыльная, но изящная зеленоватая бутыль с сургучной печатью.{/n} "Любимый купаж господина Винтерскейла. Настолько хорош, что даже не совсем законен. Но Его Светлость в свой последний визит повелел придержать бутыль до его возвращения. А теперь кто знает, вернется ли он сюда еще когда-либо? Не пропадать же добру".

traits.locale_text: "Для вас, {mf|господин|госпожа}, всегда что-нибудь найдется. Дайте-ка я пошурую тут под стойкой, кажется, было у меня что-то на такой случай".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."
languages.original_text: "Для вас, {mf|господин|госпожа}, всегда найдется". {n}На стойке появляется пыльная, но изящная зеленоватая бутыль с сургучной печатью.{/n} "Любимый купаж господина Винтерскейла. Настолько хорош, что даже не совсем законен. Но Его Светлость в свой последний визит повелел придержать бутыль до его возвращения. А теперь кто знает, вернется ли он сюда еще когда-либо? Не пропадать же добру".

So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

languages.text: “我这里始终都有给您备好的酒，大人。”{n}奥克塔维娜拿出一个落满了灰但做工精细的绿瓶子，放在吧台上，上面带着蜡封。{/n}“这是温特斯凯尔大人最喜欢的酒，味道非常棒，所以也不完全合法。他上次过来的时候，让我先在这里放上一瓶，等他回来之后再喝。不过，谁知道他现在还会不会回来呢？要是他不回来，那这酒可就太浪费了。”
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: “我这里始终都有给您备好的酒，大人。”{n}奥克塔维娜拿出一个落满了灰但做工精细的绿瓶子，放在吧台上，上面带着蜡封。{/n}“这是温特斯凯尔大人最喜欢的酒，味道非常棒，所以也不完全合法。他上次过来的时候，让我先在这里放上一瓶，等他回来之后再喝。不过，谁知道他现在还会不会回来呢？要是他不回来，那这酒可就太浪费了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下のためになら、いつでも」{n}埃っぽいが丁寧に作られた緑がかった瓶に、蝋で封印がされている。{/n}「ウィンタースケール様お気に入りのブレンドです。あまりにも美味しくて、完全に合法とは呼べません。しかし前回の訪問で、彼が戻ってくるまでボトルを保管しておくように言われまして。でも、いつ戻ってこられるかなんて分かりませんよね？ただ保管していては勿体ないです」
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下のためになら、いつでも」{n}埃っぽいが丁寧に作られた緑がかった瓶に、蝋で封印がされている。{/n}「ウィンタースケール様お気に入りのブレンドです。あまりにも美味しくて、完全に合法とは呼べません。しかし前回の訪問で、彼が戻ってくるまでボトルを保管しておくように言われまして。でも、いつ戻ってこられるかなんて分かりませんよね？ただ保管していては勿体ないです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Para usted siempre, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Una botella verdosa llena de polvo con un sello de cera aparece en la barra.{/n} «La mezcla favorita de Lord Winterscale. Tan buena que no es del todo legal. Sin embargo, durante su última visita, milord me dijo que guardara una botella hasta su regreso. Y quién sabe si volverá. Sería una pena echarla a perder».
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: «Para usted siempre, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Una botella verdosa llena de polvo con un sello de cera aparece en la barra.{/n} «La mezcla favorita de Lord Winterscale. Tan buena que no es del todo legal. Sin embargo, durante su última visita, milord me dijo que guardara una botella hasta su regreso. Y quién sabe si volverá. Sería una pena echarla a perder».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Für Euch immer, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft." {n}Eine staubige, aber hochwertig hergestellt grüne Flasche mit einem Wachssiegel erscheint auf dem Tresen.{/n} "Lord Winterzunders Lieblingsgetränk. So gut, dass es nicht vollkommen legal ist. Aber bei seinem letzten Besuch hat seine Lordschaft mir gesagt, ich soll eine Flasche beiseitestellen, bis er wiederkommt. Und wer weiß, ob er jetzt jemals wiederkommen wird? Wäre doch Verschwendung."
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: "Für Euch immer, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft." {n}Eine staubige, aber hochwertig hergestellt grüne Flasche mit einem Wachssiegel erscheint auf dem Tresen.{/n} "Lord Winterzunders Lieblingsgetränk. So gut, dass es nicht vollkommen legal ist. Aber bei seinem letzten Besuch hat seine Lordschaft mir gesagt, ich soll eine Flasche beiseitestellen, bis er wiederkommt. Und wer weiß, ob er jetzt jemals wiederkommen wird? Wäre doch Verschwendung."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Pour vous, toujours, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. » {n}Elle pose sur le bar une bouteille verdâtre coiffée d'un bouchon de cire. Malgré la poussière qui la recouvre, sa qualité est évidente.{/n} « La boisson préférée du seigneur Winterscale, un vin tellement bon qu'il n'est pas totalement légal. Lors de sa dernière visite, Sa Seigneurie m'a demandé de lui en mettre une bouteille de côté d'ici en prévision de son retour, mais allez savoir s'il reviendra ici un jour. Ce serait dommage de gâcher un délice pareil. »
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: « Pour vous, toujours, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. » {n}Elle pose sur le bar une bouteille verdâtre coiffée d'un bouchon de cire. Malgré la poussière qui la recouvre, sa qualité est évidente.{/n} « La boisson préférée du seigneur Winterscale, un vin tellement bon qu'il n'est pas totalement légal. Lors de sa dernière visite, Sa Seigneurie m'a demandé de lui en mettre une bouteille de côté d'ici en prévision de son retour, mais allez savoir s'il reviendra ici un jour. Ce serait dommage de gâcher un délice pareil. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, siz istersiniz de olmaz mı?" {n}Tezgâhta tozlu ama ince işçiliğiyle göze çarpan, yeşilimtırak bir şişe beliriyor. Ağzı bal mumuyla mühürlenmiş.{/n} "Lord Winterscale'in en sevdiği harmandır. Öyle lezizdir ki kısmen yasaklıdır. Lord Hazretleri, bir sonraki ziyareti için bir şişe ayırmamı istemişti. Geri dönüp dönmeyeceği meçhul. Araya gitmesin."
languages.original_text: "For you, always, my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}A dusty but finely made greenish bottle with a wax seal appears on the bar.{/n} "Lord Winterscale's favourite blend. So good it's not entirely legal. However, during his last visit, His Lordship told me to put a bottle aside until his return. And who knows if he'll ever return here now? It would be a waste."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, siz istersiniz de olmaz mı?" {n}Tezgâhta tozlu ama ince işçiliğiyle göze çarpan, yeşilimtırak bir şişe beliriyor. Ağzı bal mumuyla mühürlenmiş.{/n} "Lord Winterscale'in en sevdiği harmandır. Öyle lezizdir ki kısmen yasaklanmıştır. Lord Hazretleri sonraki ziyareti için bir şişe ayırmamı istemişti. Ama geri dönüp dönmeyeceği ne malum? Araya gitmesin."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
